full_output.summary: Final-year undergraduate in Computer Science with a strong foundation in object-oriented programming (OOP), data structures, and full-stack software development. Proficient in relational and non-relational databases, and building scalable and efficient applications. Experienced in designing user interfaces, optimizing applications for speed, scalability, and security, and collaborating with cross-functional teams in agile environments.

projects.name: Music Recommendation System
projects.description: Built a scalable recommendation engine by analyzing user preferences and benchmarking against industry trends. Leveraged Pandas for data manipulation, scikit-learn for model building, and Matplotlib for data visualization.

projects.name: Brain Stroke Identification
projects.description: Developed a machine learning model to classify brain images for stroke detection, enhancing healthcare diagnostics. Conducted model evaluation using accuracy metrics, ROC curves, and cross-validation.

experiences.description: Contributed to web development and database management projects, optimizing application performance. Designed user interfaces and enhanced database schemas for better performance and scalability.

Conducted fundamental investigations into NLP methods and ML algorithms to discern sentiment in textual data. Engaged in data preprocessing, model development, and analysis. Applied these techniques in the context of AI research.

full_output.name: Karri Sravani
